Title: Best clear whey ever
Content: Love this! I struggle with normal whey protein so finding a decent tasting clear whey is super important for me. This tastes so amazing, not artificial at all and mixes so well. The best clear whey I've ever had.

Title: Perfekt :)
Content: I find the taste of this powder very pleasant and not overpowering! It's exactly what I was looking for, a little change from the apple flavor :D

Review: Review 16|Gerne nochmal - oder auch noch nen 3tes Mal...|"I am very satisfied with the product.
The whey dissolves really well and the taste is very reminiscent of the instant iced tea you find in the supermarket - which I find very positive.
Otherwise, it's currently my standard whey after training, and I've already reordered it."

Title: Super! - Gute Zucker-Eistee-Alternative!
